body:
Please refer to the [README](/README.md) for usage instructions, and to [examples/](/examples) for usage examples.


## What's Changed
* chore: remove unused _link and _archive functions for rules_fortran by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/205
* fix: use pic_static_library when available for fortran deps by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/206


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/compare/0.9.0...0.9.1

Please refer to the [README](/README.md) for usage instructions, and to [examples/](/examples) for usage examples.


## What's Changed
* fix: Allow empty globs for Bazel 8 compatibility by @blorente in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/198
* refactor: improve .bazelrc files by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/199
* feat: Migrate to bzlmod by @blorente in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/194
* fix: Add MODULE.bazel.lock file by @blorente in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/201
* feat: Add extra_asmflags to pass custom flags to `ACTION_NAME.preprocessor_assemble` by @blorente in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/197
* feat: Add BCR release pipeline by @blorente in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/200
* fix: add permissions for id-token in release workflow by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/203
* fix: add permissions for attestations and contents by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/204

## New Contributors
* @blorente made their first contribution in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/198

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/compare/0.8.0...0.9.0

## What's Changed
* fix: fortran object compilation path should include directories by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/192
* fix: remove unused old _compile function from rule_fortran by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/193
* feat: download gcc toolchains instead of embedding into the tarballs by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/195
* feat: new gcc versions and allow versions override by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/196


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/compare/0.7.0...0.8.0

## What's Changed
* feat: improve rules_fortran by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/182
* feat: unify gcc binaries and sysroot by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/183
* feat: add openmp example to fortran code by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/184
* fix: bump rbe container image by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/185
* feat: reduce toolchain sizes and improve performance by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/186
* fix: use relative paths for includes and flags by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/187
* feat: support bazel 7 by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/188
* fix: run rbe macos by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/189
* docs: update documentation to reflect current state of repo by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/190
* feat: further improve toolchain sizes by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/pull/191


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/f0rmiga/gcc-toolchain/compare/0.6.0...0.7.0

name: Release 0.1.0
body:
## What's Changed
* feat: gcc toolchain by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/aspect-build/gcc-toolchain/pull/1
* fix: use -isystem instead of -I by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/aspect-build/gcc-toolchain/pull/2
* rm: hermetic directories and explicit includes by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/aspect-build/gcc-toolchain/pull/3

* feat: expose all binaries by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/aspect-build/gcc-toolchain/pull/5
* feat: set -rpath and --dynamic-linker to sysroot by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/aspect-build/gcc-toolchain/pull/6
* feat: add config_settings that match platforms by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/aspect-build/gcc-toolchain/pull/7
* feat: filegroup that transitions to target platform by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/aspect-build/gcc-toolchain/pull/8
* feat: aarch64 by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/aspect-build/gcc-toolchain/pull/9
* fix: change defaults for hardcode_sysroot_{ld_linux,rpath} by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/aspect-build/gcc-toolchain/pull/10
* feat: user-provided extra cflags, cxxflags, ldflags by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/aspect-build/gcc-toolchain/pull/11
* Create README.md by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/gcc-toolchain/pull/12
* fix: __hardcode_sysroot_rpath__ is not a string by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/aspect-build/gcc-toolchain/pull/13
* doc: initial rules documentation by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/aspect-build/gcc-toolchain/pull/14
* feat: static libstdc++ by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/aspect-build/gcc-toolchain/pull/15
* feat: fasterci config by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/aspect-build/gcc-toolchain/pull/17
* fix: use relative paths for tools by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/aspect-build/gcc-toolchain/pull/16
* feat: user-provided sysroot by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/aspect-build/gcc-toolchain/pull/18
* feat: armv7 custom sysroot by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/aspect-build/gcc-toolchain/pull/19
* feat: sysroot for x86_64, armv7 and aarch64 by @f0rmiga in https://github.com/aspect-build/gcc-toolchain/pull/21

## New Contributors
* @f0rmiga made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/gcc-toolchain/pull/1
* @alexeagle made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/gcc-toolchain/pull/12

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/gcc-toolchain/commits/0.1.0
